title: [K-12] Immersive VR-Based Language Instruction Design for Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Foundational Language Education Theories and Basic Digital Device Literacy
context.additional_context: Development of practical content applicable to elementary language education settings, utilizing smartphone-based VR solutions feasible in limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can design language education scenarios using VR technology in collaborative learning settings.
Learners can plan interactive language activities for elementary learners in immersive virtual spaces.
Learners can establish a VR-based collaborative learning assessment system feasible in limited-technology environments.

resources: 3D virtual environment resources for language education
Project management tool for PBL (Project-Based Learning)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
